title: LF mid-Gold+ Duo partner
body:
Im a JG main thats G3 54 LP.

Looking for a regular duo partner to climb with. This person will preferably be G3+.

Pretty much abusing Evelynn currently. I off role top or support.

IGN: Pinkbitsftw

replies.body: I'm a support main, so I've added you, nearly gold myself. Thought to give you a ad in game.
